bike.description: C10 super-light high-modulus carbon w/ internal shift cable routing, shaped oversized ride-tuned down tube, tapered 1 1/8" - 1.5" head tube. Rear triangle: C10 super-light high-modulus carbon seatstays w/ shaped ride-tuned chainstay, carbon dropout and replaceable hanger

components.description: Fox 32 FLOAT 29 Factory Fit w/ Kashima coating, Terra Logic, 15mm thru axle, tapered alloy steerer, 100mm travel
DT 240 15mm thru-axle front / DT 240 135mm rear, 32H 6-bolt hubs, Sun Inferno 25 rims
Schwalbe Nobby Nic, tubless ready, 29" x 2.25" folding, 67 tpi
Oval M850SL, carbon flat bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 710mm wide, +/- 5mm rise
Oval M813 carbon matrix, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval M800, carbon double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 350mm
